title: What resources are available to homeless people in Nashville, TN? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are shelters, some safe, others that our people won't try. A lot of churches have food, self-service pantries with canned food. Room at the Inn has a good reputation. There are several camps. We take food out to the group under our bridge. There are social services available but they aren't always equipped to deal with the mental issues.
